summary:
$Dependency Updates$ : bumped to 0.1.27
$Feature$: Adds `citation` to `index.js` from `urllib.parse`.

$Bug Fix$: Improved performance and fixed re-embedding issues in EmbedChain.
$Feature$: Added optional "citations" flag to query function.
$Dependency Update$: Bumped Poetry version from 0.1.27 to 0.1.28.

$Feature$ : Added citations flag for EmbedChain.
$Dependency Update$ : Minor update in package version from 0.1.28 to 0.1.29.

$Feature$: Adds 'Substack' as a supported data source.
$Refactor$: Changes the source URL from sitemap.xml to the main base URL for Substack data sources.
$Bug Fix$: Improves error handling for HTTP requests and XML parsing, and adds handling for non-sitemap URLs.
$Dependency Update$: Adds dependency on `xml.etree`.
$Dependency Update$: Bumped version from 0.1.29 to 0.1.30
$Feature$: Added documentation about getting source along with the answer.
$Dependency$: Package version from 0.1.31 to 0.1.32
$Dependency Update: LLMs imported from langchain.llms to langchain.llms.cohere, langchain.llms.replicate and langchain.llms.huggingface_hub$

$Feature$: Updated default chunk size from 500 to 2000 in WebPageChunker for better performance.
$Refactor$: Adjusted chunk sizes and overlap values for specific chunker types and applied custom configuration values using ChunkerConfig for consistent configuration across chunkers.

$Feature$ : Updated build system tool from setuptools to poetry
$Dependency$ : Added `poetry-core` to `requires` of `build-system`

$Documentation$ - Updates to FAQs and examples.
$Support$ - Configuration updates for DirectoryLoader.
$Refactor$ - Utility function updates and import handling.

$Feature$: Add PyPy and PyPI download badges to README
$Configuration$: Update ChunkerConfig min_chunk_size constraints in add_config.py

$Feature$ : Added support for using a directory as a data source in EmbedChain.
$Tests$: Added tests for the new directory data source.

$Bug Fix$ : Fixed error caused by executing Repo.clone_from twice
$Tests$ : Added tests for discussion search

$Documentation$ : Added instructions on using a range of language models, including MistralAI, ChatGPT 4 turbo, GPT-4, and open source models.
$Configuration$ : Loaded LLM configuration from opensource.yaml file

$Installation$ : Removed the "Examples" section from the page title and heading.
$Documentation$ : Simplified the introduction, removing unnecessary phrases.
$Documentation$ : Eliminated the "Collection of..." phrase in the heading of the tables.
$Documentation$ : Removed unnecessary spacing between table rows.
$Chore$ : Added a new example group: "Notebooks and Replits".
$Bug Fix$ : Removed the deployment name configuration for the OpenAI text embedding model.

$Feature: Added Slack data source support$
$Documentation: Simplified example and added Slack data source support to documentation$
$Installation: Automatic data retrieval for Slack$

$Bug Fix$: Fixed the chunker configuration bug.
$Configuration$: Updated the configuration to include a new 'min_chunk_size' option with a value of 0.

$Feature$ : Updated the Chainlit app setup and improved the Streamlit docs.
$Dependency Update$: Updated the LLM model to "mistralai/Mistral-8x7B-Instruct-v0.1" in app.py and config.yaml.

$Feature: OpenAI function calling support$
$API Update: Updated to the latest version of OpenAI API$
$Tests: Tests for OpenAI functions$
$Chore$: Code improvement for display of Modal.com in overview section.

- Feature: Added Sadhguru AI app demonstration.
- Feature: Added a section "Getting started" to give users a better idea on how to start working with Embedchain.
- Feature: Added a section "Support" to provide users contact information and a quickstart guide.
- Refactor: Code style refactoring.
- Refactor: Added support for Windows systems.
- Refactor: Updated documentation links for component overview.
- Support: Moved REST API port to 8080.
- Support: Added documentation for using the REST API with Python.
- Support: Improvements to REST API documentation.
- Installation: Docs on steps to setup the software.
- Chore: Contributions section moved.
- Configuration: Updated documentation links.
- Configuration: Updated docs to reflect latest changes in platform.
- Dependency Update: Updated documentation links for PyPI, Twitter, and Embedchain.
- Dependency Update: Added a new documentation link for Sadhguru AI.
- Dependency Update: Updated documentation links for Slack, Twitter, and Substack.

$Feature$: Emphasized the "Conventional but Configurable" design principle, and removed the production-ready tag.
$Documentation$: Updated the Python API installation command, and added a Discord Community link.

$Feature$ : Added test flag for specifying a specific file to run in pytest
$Dependency$ : Updated version to 0.1.37, and made various dependency changes including updating beautifulsoup4, pypdf, etc.

$Feature$: Added FAQ on persisting data across multiple app sessions.
$Chore$: Updated titles and configuration examples.

$Feature: Added AI chatbot functionality in the Unacademy UPSC AI app, enabling users to ask questions and receive AI-powered responses.$
$Dependency: Added embedchain, streamlit, and pysqlite3-binary libraries.$

$Bug Fix$
- Fix: Remove unused and deprecated app.count method
$Bug Fix: Added features to display sources in the application.$

$Configuration$ : Configuration changes in `config.yaml`, `config.json` and `config.py`.
$Bug Fix$ : Fixed an issue with the `--port` option in the `dev` command.

**$Feature$**: Added ability to specify the number of results to retrieve via the "count" parameter in the config.
**$Dependency$**: Updated the package version from 0.1.54 to 0.1.55.

$Bug Fix$: Removed unnecessary "channel" field from the message metadata.
$Dependency Update$: Updated dependencies.

$Feature$: Docker support for full-stack app creation and execution.
$Installation$: Updated Docker instructions and included images for visual guidance.
$Documentation$: Improved documentation for full-stack app setup and usage.
$Dependency$: Package version from 0.1.55 to 0.1.56
$Feature: GPT4All can now work offline.$
$Dependency$: Bump version from 0.1.50 to 0.1.51
$Documentation: Adding `session_id` parameter to docs for maintaining chat sessions for different users.$

$Bug Fix$: Fix pdf streamlit example.
$Tests$: Update tests for source link fix.

$Bug Fix: Fixed cache session id in chat method.$
$Refactor: 
- Renamed `query_embedding` to `query`.
- Renamed `add_embedding` to `add`.
- Renamed `embedding` to `chunk`.
- Set `ChunkerConfig` as the default config for the `add` function.
- Set `BaseLlmConfig` as the default config for the `query` function.$
$Bug Fix$: Updated seq2seq generation top_p to 0.5 to control randomness of LLM output.
$Documentation$  Minor update to documentation with typo fixes and improved wording.

$Bug Fix$: Fixes a bug where an existing doc is not updated with new content.
$Refactor$: Swaps the arguments for `.add()` method, adds `self.is_docs_site_instance` to the `add` method to check if the data type is `DataType.DOCS_SITE`.
$Chore$: Removes code related to the `user_asks` list in `.add()` to reduce memory usage.
$Dependency$: Changes parser type file from 'lxml-xml' to 'html.parser' and adds 'embedder' and 'embedding_model' to the code.
$Configuration$: Adds two new optional fields to the config validation: `title` and `task_type`.

$Bug Fix$: Fixed issues with search methods in app (#1092)
$Dependency update$: Updated 'schema' dependency to '^0.7.5'

$Refactor$ Updated class to use embedchain helpers.json_serializable instead of embedchain.helper.json_serializable
$Refactor$ Moved `helper` to `helpers` in the import statement
$Feature$: Added score to search results.
$Dependency Update: Package version from 0.1.45 to 0.1.46$
$Dependency$: Package version from 0.1.46 to 0.1.47

$Feature$: Added ability to retrieve answer context when citations are enabled.
$Bug Fix$: Improved metadata in sources.
$Documentation$: Improved documentation for citation feature.
$Style/Formatting$: Update dark mode logo
$Feature: Redesign of UI using React and addition of new views and components.$

$Feature$: Updated metadata, live demo, and added documentation links.
$Installation$: Updated community links and added an intro to the file.

$Feature$: Add four new deployment options: Gradio.app, Huggingface.co, Embedchain.ai, and Huggingface Spaces.
$Style/Formatting$: Move `embedchain_ai` and `huggingface_spaces` from second to the third list item in `mint.json`.
$Feature$ : Updated framework description and link.
$Bug Fix$: Link to embedchain repo updated in issue searching instruction.
